Package br.usp.poli.takiyama.common

Interface Summary
AggregationParfactor  
Builder<T> Interface to apply the Builder pattern.
Constraint This class represents constraints of the form X ? Y, where X and Y are Terms and ? is an comparison operator.
Distribution A set of parfactors that represents a joint probability distribution.
DoubleDispatchParfactorVisitor Visitor for Parfactors.
Factor  
Marginal Represents the marginal ∑Γ J(Φ), where Γ is a set of Random Variables and J(Φ) is a Distribution.
Parfactor  
ParfactorDecorator Implements decorator pattern for parfactors.
ParfactorVisitor Visitor for Parfactors.
VisitableParfactor Parfactors that implement this interface are considered 'visitable' by ParfactorVisitor.
 

Class Summary
ConstantFactor  
EqualityConstraint This class represent equations of the form ti = tj, where ti and tj are parameters of a parameterized random variable.
FactorTest  
InequalityConstraint This class represents inequality constraints of the form X ≠ Y, where X and Y are a Terms.
InputOutput<I,O>  
MultiplicationChecker Encapsulates the algorithm to check conditions for multiplication between Parfactors.
RandomVariable A random variable is a function that, given an element from its domain, returns a real number.
Scanner  
SplitResult Represents the result of a split operation over Parfactors.
StdDistribution Standard implementation of Distribution.
StdFactor Factors are table representations for joint distributions.
StdMarginal  
StdMarginal.StdMarginalBuilder  
Tuple<E>
